original_title: Andrea Bocelli: Music For Hope - Live From Duomo di Milano
overview: Opera singer Andrea Bocelli prepares to sing his "Amazing Grace" finale during his Easter "Music For Hope: Live From Duomo di Milano." Members of the public were not allowed in the cathedral due to the ongoing lockdown to control the coronavirus outbreak. The concert was live-streamed around the world.
title: Andrea Bocelli: Music For Hope - Live From Duomo di Milano
